'''Alpha v1.0.5_01''' is a version of [[Java Edition Alpha]], released on July 14, 2010<ref>[[wordofnotch:812223532|Minecraft Alpha 1.0.5_01]] – The Word of Notch, July 14, 2010</ref> that made changes to snow introduced in [[Alpha v1.0.5]]. This version is available in the launcher.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Snow Block JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Snow Block]]'''
* Now requires to be mined using a [[shovel]] in order to drop [[snowball]]s.

'''[[File:Snow (layers 1) JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Snow]]'''
* Now requires to be mined using a [[shovel]] in order to drop [[snowball]]s.

'''[[File:Water JE10.png|32px]] [[Water]]'''
* Can now freeze into [[ice]].

=== Items ===
'''[[File:Snowball JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Snowball]]s'''
* Now stack into stacks of 8 instead of 64.
* Changed the volume and pitch of the sound effect for throwing them.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Multiplayer]] '''
* Improved some aspects (although multiplayer is still in private testing).
** [[Block]]s can now be broken.
** Added movement verification.
** It is now impossible for the client to claim to mine a block they cannot.
** It is now impossible for the client to mine blocks too fast.
** It is now impossible to move through [[solid block]]s.

== Fixes ==
'''2 bugs fixed'''
* [[Stone]] and stone-like blocks now drop material on a [[pickaxe]]'s last hit.
* [[Snow block]]s on top of [[snow layer]]s no longer make the top side disappear.</onlyinclude>
